Actions.ActionName: Set this Variable to the Folder Name to be selected in Hazel

Actions.Text:
----------------------------------------------------------------
# Auth: Christopher Stone
# dCre: 2019/01/26 12:20
# dMod: 2019/01/28 12:03
# Appl: Hazel, System Events, System Preferences, Keyboard Maestro Engine
# Task: Select a Folder in the Hazel Preference Pane and Right-Click.
# Libs: None
# Osax: None
# Tags: @Applescript, @Script, @Keyboard_Maestro_Engine, @System_Events, @System_Preferences, @Select, @Folder, @Hazel, @Preference, @Pane, @Right-Click
# Vers: 1.02
----------------------------------------------------------------

try
	
	--» Get the desired Folder Name from Keyboard Maestro
	tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
		set folderNameToSelect to getvariable "hazelFolderToSelect"
	end tell
	
	--» Activate the Hazel Preference Pane.
	tell application "System Preferences"
		activate
		if id of front pane is not "com.noodlesoft.Hazel" then
			reveal anchor "Folders" of pane id "com.noodlesoft.Hazel"
		end if
	end tell
	
	--» Select the Given Folder Name.
	tell application "System Events"
		tell application process "System Preferences"
			
			repeat until name of front window is "Hazel"
				delay 0.25
			end repeat
			
			tell window "Hazel"
				tell group 1
					tell scroll area 1
						set focused to true
						
						tell table 1
							
							set selected of row 1 to true
							keystroke folderNameToSelect
							
							tell (first row whose UI element 1's name is folderNameToSelect)
								set selected to true
								tell its UI element 1
									set {x, y} to position
								end tell
							end tell
							
						end tell
					end tell
				end tell
			end tell
		end tell
	end tell
	
	--» Send Keyboard Maestro the Cooedinates of the Given Folder.
	tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"
		setvariable "hazelFolderX" to x
		setvariable "hazelFolderY" to y
	end tell
	
on error e number n
	set e to e & return & return & "Num: " & n
	if n ≠ -128 then
		try
			tell application (path to frontmost application as text) to set ddButton to button returned of ¬
				(display dialog e with title "ERROR!" buttons {"Copy Error Message", "Cancel", "OK"} ¬
					default button "OK" giving up after 30)
			if ddButton = "Copy Error Message" then set the clipboard to e
		end try
	end if
end try

----------------------------------------------------------------
